definition: to pay a formal visit/to call to pay respects/to pay homage (at a monument, mausoleum etc)
to pay homage at a mausoleum
to visit/to pay one's respects to (a revered figure etc)/to pay homage (at a tomb etc)
to pay one's respects/to visit (ancestral grave)

sentences.english: Germany KQ is the only agent in China, Ye-industrial coating services for the entire country.
sentences.chinese: 是德國KQ唯一中國代理，謁誠爲全國塗料工業服務。

sentences.english: Wholeheartedly welcome faithful cooperation from men of insight of all circles.
sentences.chinese: 謁誠歡迎各界有識之士坦誠相見，真誠合作。

sentences.english: We welcome domestic and international business partners for mutual cooperation and a brighter future.
sentences.chinese: 謁誠歡迎國內外水族界朋友攜手合作，共謀發展。

definition: to go (to visit a superior)/one's current attainment in learning or art

various sages/refers to the classical schools of thought, e.g. Confucianism 儒[ru2] represented by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3], Daoism 道[dao4] by Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3] and Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3], Mohism 墨[mo4] by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], Legalism 法[fa3] by Sunzi 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3] and Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子[Han2 Fei1 zi3], and numerous others
worthy predecessor/distinguished person of the past/former sage
junior scholar or pupil in imperial China
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
